actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Stafford under the authority of the order of May 12, 82 with an amendment. With written report No. 97-458.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 652.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works with amendment, S. Rept. 97-458) Authorizes appropriations for FY 1983 for the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

titles.title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.
